group_1.textLeft: What's this...?
...Erm, you know...
We were lookin' for a sunken ship,@not a deserted island...

group_1.textRight: According to legend, it shouldn't be@too far from this area.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so?

group_1.textRight: The story is from ages ago, so the distance or@direction might have been obscured over the years...
If we head out any further than this island,@though, we'll risk getting swept away.
Normally, I would've turned around@by now...

group_1.textLeft: Well, we'll do some lookin' around.@Can you wait for us on the boat?

group_1.textRight: Sure. Just give me a shout@when you're done.
I suppose we'll have to scope out the@sunken ship from here...
But how can we do that? We don't even@have any means of diving.

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it obvious, Sunao? We'll just have to@swim out and look!

group_1.textRight: It's not that simple...
[chara:102750:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Shizuka?! Wait!

group_1.textLeft: Woah, what're you doing, Shizuka?@Are you actually trying to swim there?!
Hang on just a second! Shizuka!

group_1.textRight: Shizuka! C'mon, let's go back together!

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to be so frantic.@I can swim just fine.

group_1.textRight: Even so, it's dangerous! Some places can@get real deep real quick!

group_1.textLeft: I can handle this depth perfectly - [chara:102551:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102551:cheek_0][chara:102551:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:102551:lipSynch_1:effect_shake]ahâ€•!

group_1.textRight: Shizuka?!
Good lord... What did I just tell you?!

group_1.textLeft: *Cough* *Hack* Phew...
Thank you, Miss Togame...

group_1.textRight: It's fine. I'm just relieved you're okay.

group_1.textLeft: The water from the ocean is...very salty...

group_1.textRight: Don't you EVER make me worry like@that again, Shizuka!
That's right!
You need to understand just how frightening@the ocean can be!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: Blindly swimming out to sea is a reckless@move.
We need to determine both the exact location of@the shipwreck and a way to dive safely into the sea.

group_1.textLeft: We don't have enough info to work with,@though...
Could there be a book with more details@on the history of the village?

group_1.textRight: History, history...@[chara:121003:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:121003:cheek_0][chara:121003:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_200][chara:121003:lipSynch_1]That's it! Yuta!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that guy Miyo likes?

group_1.textRight: He studies local history and seems to@know a lot about the village culture.
If we can get him to discuss it all in detail,@he might have some ideas.

group_1.textLeft: Got it. Maybe we can ask Miyo to set@something up.

group_1.textRight: With that settled...how are we supposed@to go diving?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...perhaps I could manage something@through Coordination?

group_1.textRight: Would that be possible?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Why, of course it is.
The swimsuits Momoko and I are both wearing@were Coordinated by my own hand.

group_1.textRight: No way! I had no idea...

group_1.textLeft: Still...can you modify the forms of five@Magical Girls at once?

group_1.textRight: That may not be possible.@It does take a lot of magic...

group_1.textLeft: Thought so...
We'll suss out the details on that later.
For now, let's get back to the village@and talk to Miyo.

group_1.textRight: Yes, we'll see if she can get in touch@with Yuta.
Still...she did so much work in getting us@a boat, only for it all to be a wash...

group_1.textLeft: Miyo will be disappointed if we come back@empty-handed...
...Oh! Why don't we take this as a souvenir?
It surely must be some special tool used@by ancient people long ago!

group_1.textRight: Wah! It's so rusty!
That's a lighter, though...

group_1.textLeft: A...lighter?
